option.name: updatedContent
option.value: version: 2 updates: - package-ecosystem: "github-actions" directory: "/" schedule: interval: "weekly" - package-ecosystem: "gradle" directory: "/" schedule: interval: "weekly" open-pull-requests-limit: 10 ignore: - dependency-name: "org.jetbrains.dokka" # handled manually due to breaking changes - package-ecosystem: "gradle" directory: "/buildSrc/" schedule: interval: "weekly" open-pull-requests-limit: 10

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: Build and Test (Gradle)
on: push: branches: [ main, master ] pull_request: branches: [ main, master ] workflow_dispatch:
jobs: build: runs-on: ubuntu-latest timeout-minutes: 30 steps: - name: Checkout code uses: actions/checkout@v4
- name: Set up JDK 21 uses: actions/setup-java@v4 with: distribution: 'temurin' java-version: '21' cache: 'gradle'
- name: Grant execute permission for gradlew run: chmod +x ./gradlew
- name: Build with Gradle run: ./gradlew build --no-daemon
- name: Run tests run: ./gradlew test --no-daemon
- name: Generate Dokka HTML docs run: ./gradlew dokkaHtmlMultiModule --no-daemon || ./gradlew dokkaHtml --no-daemon || true continue-on-error: true
- name: Upload Dokka docs artifact if: always() uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4 with: name: dokka-docs path: '**/build/dokka/**'

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# OS junk .DS_Store Thumbs.db
# IDEs .idea/ *.iml *.ipr *.iws .vscode/
# Gradle .gradle/ build/ !*/src/**/build/ !*/build.gradle.kts
# Build outputs **/build/ **/out/
# Logs *.log
# Misc *.swp *.swo *.tmp *.bak
# Root scripts and jars /*.bat /*.sh /*.jar
# Exclude generated and cache files **/generated/ **/.cache/
# Node/npm (if any) node_modules/
# Python (if any) __pycache__/ *.pyc
# Exclude secrets *.keystore *.jks *.p12 *.pem *.key *.crt *.der *.json
# Exclude local properties local.properties
